text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass where concept is-a STC

name: ActClassStateTransitionControl
title: ActClassStateTransitionControl
description: Sender transmits a status change pertaining to the focal act of the payload. This status of the focal act is the final state of the state transition. This can be either a request or a command, according to the mood of the control act.
